804B8D47458475A8077009825F1A4037:
<EmphTitle>Advanced Weaponry</> 
Face Mask Maker Daigo's forces as you blast enemies with <EmphA>plasma pistols</>, slice with <EmphA>dual daggers</>, or wield a mighty <EmphA>war hammer</>. 


<EmphTitle>Squad Up to Level Up</> 
Gain <EmphA>Hero XP</> on <EmphB>Super Squad</> missions to earn upgrades and unlocks for your Hero Class.


<EmphTitle>Upgrade Your Superpowers</> 
Visit <EmphA>Training Terminals</> to upgrade your <EmphA>Superpowers</> at Supernova Academy.
FD03ED6C441537BB3A96589F53CA08C6:
Acquire some <EmphasizeText>weapons</> with <EmphasizeText>available rune slots</>.

Then use the <EmphasizeText>Rune Forge</> to <EmphasizeText>enchant</> them with powerful runes to give them magical <EmphasizeText>abilities</>!
99D771924912E8FFF2183DBB13B27743: All Party members must be in the <EmphA>Supernova Academy</> to launch.
CA1D96A047B5747EB84622881585943F: All Party members must be in the <EmphA>Supernova Academy</> to launch.
30A2275B4C2C892CB48446A5176B9256: Between missions, you can swap Hero Classes at a Training Terminal!
C8D03FEE49A7409B449D41B8BEE96D87: Congratulations on your acceptance to <EmphA>Supernova Academy</>. At this elite training program, you'll hone your new <EmphA>Superpowers</>, master advanced weaponry, and venture out on <EmphB>Super Squads</> to complete dangerous missions!
11CD072A435CD984D8ACC5BC6D6AD3F3:
Find <emphA>Weapons</> and <emphA>Gadgets</> out on Missions, or use <emphA>Essence</> to buy them from Fetch's Crew at the Academy.

Nothing goes to waste, hero. Recycle <emphA>Weapons</> and <emphA>Gadgets</>  to get <emphA>Essence</>.
928D16E1491DAE1D26FADB8CC5BF2D7F: Launch a random Expert mission. Bring your friends or go alone; no one will be matched in to help you!
964F0AE5464B4B4F401A72893EEA921A: Missions can only be started by <EmphA>The Party Leader</>.
5113804741E3E27C8349C7A198A91A00:
So, you made it back in one piece. Now the real training begins.

Go on <EmphA>Missions</> and do <EmphA>Assignments</> to earn <EmphA>Hero XP</>. Spend <EmphA>Hero XP</> to <EmphA>level up your Hero Class Powers</>!
670E521A4777A820E8DB97876B662094: There are too many members in your party to begin a mission!
